where.label: WR1
where.expression: 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF ( SELF . of_shape . definition )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'instantiated feature' ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect_relationship . related_shape_aspect :<>: SELF \ shape_aspect_relationship . relating_shape_aspect

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( TYPEOF ( SELF ) - TYPEOF ( SELF \ shape_aspect || SELF \ shape_aspect_relationship || SELF \ component_feature_relationship ) ) = 0

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect . name = ''

where.label: WR6
where.expression: SELF \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = ''

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description IN [ 'assembly module component terminal' , 'bare die component terminal' , 'component termination passage join terminal' , 'conductive interconnect element terminal' , 'interconnect component join terminal' , 'interconnect module component terminal' , 'land join terminal' , 'minimally defined component terminal' , 'non functional land join terminal' , 'packaged component join terminal' , 'printed component join terminal' , 'package terminal occurrence' , 'via terminal' ] ) OR ( 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_MACRO_COMPONENT_JOIN_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) ) OR ( 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'INTERCONNECT_MODULE_MACRO_COMPONENT_JOIN_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF ( SELF . of_shape . definition )

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'instantiated feature' ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( at <* QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'associated terminals' ) | 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PHYSICAL_CONNECTIVITY_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF ( at . relating_shape_aspect ) ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( cr <* QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'connectivity requirement' ) | 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PHYSICAL_NETWORK' IN TYPEOF ( cr . relating_shape_aspect ) ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR6
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'design usage' ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR7
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description IN [ 'assembly module component terminal' , 'bare die component terminal' , 'package terminal occurrence' , 'packaged component join terminal' , 'printed component join terminal' ] ) ) OR ( SELF . product_definitional )

where.label: WR8
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'assembly module component terminal' ) ) OR ( ( SELF . of_shape . definition . frame_of_reference . name = 'physical occurrence' ) AND ( EXISTS ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . name ) ) AND ( NOT ( EXISTS ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . name ) ) OR ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . name = 'assembly module' ) ) )

where.label: WR9
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'assembly module component terminal' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i_f <* QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'instantiated feature' ) | ( 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'ASSEMBLY_MODULE_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF ( i_f . relating_shape_aspect ) ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR10
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'bare die component terminal' ) ) OR ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . description = 'bare die component' )

where.label: WR11
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'bare die component terminal' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i_f <* QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'instantiated feature' ) | ( 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'BARE_DIE_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF ( i_f . relating_shape_aspect ) ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR13
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'component termination passage join terminal' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i_f <* QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'instantiated feature' ) | i_f . relating_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description = 'component termination passage template join terminal' ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR15
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description IN [ 'conductive interconnect element terminal' , 'interconnect component join terminal' , 'printed component join terminal' ] ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar . related_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description = 'connection zone' ) ) <= 1 )

where.label: WR16
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'interconnect module component terminal' ) ) OR ( ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . frame_of_reference . name = 'physical occurrence' ) AND ( EXISTS ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . name ) ) AND ( NOT ( EXISTS ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . name ) ) OR ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . name = 'interconnect module' ) ) )

where.label: WR17
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'interconnect module component terminal' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i_f <* QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'instantiated feature' ) | 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'INTERCONNECT_MODULE_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF ( i_f . relating_shape_aspect ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR18
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description IN [ 'land join terminal' , 'non functional land join terminal' ] ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i_f <* QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'instantiated feature' ) | ( ( 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'LAND_TEMPLATE_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF ( i_f . relating_shape_aspect ) ) AND ( TRUE ) ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR20
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'minimally defined terminal' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.DEFINITION' ) | pdr . used_representation \ representation . name = 'part terminal external reference' ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR22
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'package terminal occurrence' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ud <* QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'usage definition' ) | ( 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PACKAGE_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF ( ud . relating_shape_aspect ) ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR23
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description IN [ 'package terminal occurrence' , 'packaged component join terminal' ] ) ) OR ( ( 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PACKAGED_COMPONENT' IN TYPEOF ( SELF . of_shape . definition ) ) AND ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . frame_of_reference . name = 'physical occurrence' ) )

where.label: WR24
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'packaged component join terminal' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i_f <* QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'instantiated feature' ) | ( 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PACKAGED_PART_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF ( i_f . relating_shape_aspect ) ) AND ( i_f . relating_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description = 'join terminal' ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR25
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'packaged component join terminal' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( pd , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.DEFINITION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* pdr . used_representation . items | SIZEOF ( [ 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'LENGTH_MEASURE_WITH_UNIT' ] * TYPEOF ( it ) ) = 2 ) ) <= 2 ) ) <= 1 ) ) <= 1 )

where.label: WR26
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'packaged component join terminal' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( pd , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.DEFINITION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( lmwu <* QUERY ( it <* pdr . used_representation . items | SIZEOF ( [ 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'LENGTH_MEASURE_WITH_UNIT' ] * TYPEOF ( it ) ) = 2 ) | lmwu \ representation_item . name = 'maximum wire length' ) ) <= 1 ) ) <= 1 ) ) <= 1 )

where.label: WR27
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'packaged component join terminal' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( pd , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.DEFINITION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( lmwu <* QUERY ( it <* pdr . used_representation . items | SIZEOF ( [ 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'MEASURE_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'LENGTH_MEASURE_WITH_UNIT' ] * TYPEOF ( it ) ) = 2 ) | lmwu \ representation_item . name = 'minimum wire length' ) ) <= 1 ) ) <= 1 ) ) <= 1 )

where.label: WR28
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'printed component join terminal' ) ) OR ( ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . frame_of_reference . name = 'layout occurrence' ) AND ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . name = 'interconnect module' ) )

where.label: WR29
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'printed component join terminal' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i_f <* QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'instantiated feature' ) | ( 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PRINTED_PART_TEMPLATE_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF ( i_f . relating_shape_aspect ) ) AND ( i_f . relating_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description = 'join terminal' ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR30
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'printed component join terminal' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | pdr \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'implementation' ) | ( ( SIZEOF ( [ 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_SHAPE_ASPECT' ] * TYPEOF ( i . relating_shape_aspect ) ) >= 1 ) AND ( i . relating_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description = 'stratum feature template component' ) ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR32
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'via terminal' ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i_f <* QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'instantiated feature' ) | i_f . relating_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description = 'via template terminal' ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR33
where.expression: ( NOT ( SELF \ shape_aspect . description = 'interconnect component join terminal' ) ) OR ( ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . frame_of_reference . name = 'physical occurrence' ) AND NOT ( SELF . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . description IN [ 'assembly module component' , 'bare die component' , 'interconnect module component' , 'laminate component' , 'packaged component' ] ) )

where.label: WR34
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( pd , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.DEFINITION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( dri <* pdr . used_representation . items | ( dri \ representation_item . name = 'global swappable' ) AND ( dri \ descriptive_representation_item . description IN [ 'true' , 'false' ] ) ) ) = 1 ) ) = 1 ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR35
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( pd , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.DEFINITION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( dri <* pdr . used_representation . items | ( dri \ representation_item . name = 'local swappable' ) AND ( dri \ descriptive_representation_item . description IN [ 'true' , 'false' ] ) ) ) = 1 ) ) = 1 ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR36
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( pd , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.DEFINITION' ) | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( dri <* pdr . used_representation . items | dri \ representation_item . name = 'swap code' ) ) = 1 ) ) = 1 ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( [ 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_TERMINAL' , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_INTERFACE_TERMINAL' , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_SHAPE_ASPECT' ] * TYPEOF ( SELF . relating_shape_aspect ) ) = 1

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( [ 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_TERMINAL' , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_INTERFACE_TERMINAL' , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_SHAPE_ASPECT' ] * TYPEOF ( SELF . related_shape_aspect ) ) = 1

where.label: WR3
where.expression: ( NOT ( 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_SHAPE_ASPECT' IN TYPEOF ( SELF . relating_shape_aspect ) ) ) OR ( SELF . relating_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description IN [ 'component feature' , 'component termination passage interface terminal' , 'land or non functional land interface terminal' , 'printed connector component interface terminal' ] )

where.label: WR4
where.expression: ( NOT ( 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_SHAPE_ASPECT' IN TYPEOF ( SELF . related_shape_aspect ) ) ) OR ( SELF . related_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description IN [ 'component feature' , 'component termination passage interface terminal' , 'land or non functional land interface terminal' , 'printed connector component interface terminal' ] )

rule.name: component_feature_unique_constraint
rule.algorithm: LOCAL ct : BAG OF shape_aspect := QUERY ( ct <* component_terminal | ( ct \ shape_aspect . description IN [ 'assembly module component terminal' , 'bare die component terminal' , 'interconnect component join terminal' , 'interconnect module component terminal' , 'interconnect module component stratum based terminal' , 'minimally defined component terminal' , 'packaged component join terminal' ] ) ) ; cit : BAG OF shape_aspect := QUERY ( cit <* component_interface_terminal | ( cit \ shape_aspect . description IN [ 'interconnect component interface terminal' , 'packaged connector component interface terminal' ] ) ) ; cf : BAG OF shape_aspect ; cd_bag : BAG OF component_definition := [ ] ; sa_bag : BAG OF shape_aspect ; sar_bag : BAG OF shape_aspect_relationship ; pass : BOOLEAN := TRUE ; def_bag : BAG OF shape_aspect ; END_LOCAL ; cf := ct + cit ; REPEAT i := 1 to SIZEOF ( cf ) by 1 ; IF EXISTS ( cf [ i ] . of_shape . definition ) THEN IF ( 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF ( cf [ i ] . of_shape . definition ) ) THEN IF ( NOT ( cf [ i ] . of_shape . definition IN cd_bag ) ) THEN cd_bag := cd_bag + cf [ i ] . of_shape . definition ; END_IF ; END_IF ; END_IF ; END_REPEAT ; REPEAT i := 1 to SIZEOF ( cd_bag ) by 1 ; IF ( NOT pass ) THEN ESCAPE ; END_IF ; def_bag := [ ] ; sa_bag := QUERY ( sa <* cf | ( sa . of_shape . definition :=: cd_bag [ i ] ) ) ; REPEAT j := 1 to SIZEOF ( sa_bag ) by 1 ; IF ( NOT pass ) THEN ESCAPE ; END_IF ; sar_bag := QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN ( sa_bag [ j ] , 'COMPONENT_FEATURE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT' ) | ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'instantiated feature' ) ) ; REPEAT k := 1 to SIZEOF ( sar_bag ) by 1 ; IF EXISTS ( sar_bag [ k ] . relating_shape_aspect ) THEN IF ( sar_bag [ k ] . relating_shape_aspect IN def_bag ) THEN pass := FALSE ; ESCAPE ; ELSE def_bag := def_bag + sar_bag [ k ] . relating_shape_aspect ; END_IF ; END_IF ; END_REPEAT ; END_REPEAT ; END_REPEAT ;

where.label: WR1
where.expression: pass
